name: Write-it-once
tagline: Generator Java CodeGeneration Template Simple Dynamic Tool
body:
### About
Code / script generator based on Java classes and template engine - Prepare your [template](http://groovy.codehaus.org/Groovy+Templates), choose Java classes (e.g. with [Google Reflections](https://code.google.com/p/reflections)) and forget

More @ https://code.google.com/p/write-it-once/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
